requirement.topic: XmlBlaster provides a property file to allow a simple configuration
requirement.description: The xmlBlaster.properties file allows to customize the behavior of xmlBlaster. It is searched in the following locations: 1) In $HOME 2) In $XMLBLASTER_HOME 3) Local directory 4) Fallback: \xmlBlaster oder /usr/local/xmlBlaster
requirement.author: ruff@swand.lake.de

fix.name: ruff@swand.lake.de
fix.comment: The property file is used everywhere in the xmlBlaster code. The modules test their property variables in their own test cases.
